fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Grant someone a one day extension on life. The next time they would die, they die exactly 24 irl hours later instead. This ability may only each target player once and may not target yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The game starts on Day X instead of Day 1, where X is the day after the last game ended on.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__
